Message.Title: Spank your wife for Jesus
Message.Msg: "Because there isn’t enough batpoo crazy things going on out there in the wide, wacky world of religion, a new source of crazy has come to light. It even has a name: Christian Domestic Discipline (CDD). There are, at this point, two main websites related to this “discipline”: A Domestic Discipline (DD) marriage is one in which one partner is given authority over the other, and has the means to back up that authority, usually by spanking. A Christian Domestic Discipline (CDD) marriage is simply a traditional, male-led, Christian marriage which utilises aspects of Domestic Discipline. It is set up according to Biblical standards. Therefore, in a CDD marriage: •The husband is the head of the household, whilst the wife is submissive to her husband as if the Lord Himself was her husband. See Eph. 5:22-24. •The wife is to reverence her husband. She is to obey him, so long as his instructions are not in opposition to God's commands. See Titus 2:5, Acts 5:29.

Message.Title: Pope Gives His Blessing to Solar Power – Vatican Solar Panels (the Vatican produces electricity)
Message.Msg: " the Vatican has installed of 2,400 solar panels on its roofs in order to harness energy from the sun…..... Placed atop the famous Nervi Hall, the Vatican solar panels will generate enough electricity to power both the building itself and some surrounding structures. Pope Benedict XVI has given his blessing to the city-state’s shift to renewable energy, and notes that additional solar projects are planned at the Vatican. Shall we crown him the Photovoltaic Pope? The Vatican is 100% carbon neutral – the only sovereign state in the world that can make such a claim! Carbon offsets and renewable energy credit, as well as a large forest in Hungary owned by the Vatican is capable of absorbing all emitted carbon from the Vatican’s operations. ..." keep up the good works!!

Message.Title: Snowden Just Following Orders
Message.Msg: Janet Napolitano urged Americans, "if you see something, say something". So Snowden reveals unconstitutional acts against US citizens and look what happens. These same liberal goons were on the band wagon in the 60s protesting the government's handling of the V-war, anti-government sentiments were the buzz on every college campus in the country. Draft dodging and hi tailing it to Canada were the norm. You don't hear the left praising Snowden like they did Hanoi Jane tho the motive was the same albeit different circumstances. It's only because he upset the applecart and exposed the Dems disregard for the rights protected by a document that use to be the foundation of our Democracy. Nothing more fkd up than a phony liberal.
Appropo,. What would you expect from bimbos who voted for a man twice because of the color of his skin rather than the content of his character?
The sickest of all was all the teenage girls saying to Free the Boston Bomber because he was a cutie. Just sick. Who'd want to raise a child in this world anymore?

I like to remember going into the streets with a few vets of WW2, Korea and 'Nam. We smashed several creep parades flying Viet Cong flags and calling for their victory. They ran like rabbits though they outnumbered us hundreds to one. All of us opposed the 'Nam war too as it was not pursued properly and drug out when it could have been ended in weeks. But, we would not stand by and watch trriatorous commies parade in the street while their buddies were killing our men in 'Nam.

Message.Msg: These panels may pencil out on a large scale. They still don't for the average homeowner, Even with the subsidies. Always wonder what happened to all the things "Big Bubba" seized from the Tesla labs during WW2. He claimed he could draw power from the earths magnetic field. Think maybe they would suppress something like that? My dad designed a solution for a very expensive problem during WW2.. He gave it to the Navy. After the war he found a certain company had the patent on it. Gee, would someone serving "Big Bubba" sell my dad's invention when it was given freely to the government?
